Plot: This is the untold story of The Exorcist, a chronicle of true events based on the priest's secret diary the world was not to see.
Title: The Haunted Boy: The Secret Diary of the Exorcist
Writer: Raymond Bishop (true story), Christopher Saint Booth (screenplay), Philip Adrian Booth (screenplay)
Director: Christopher Saint Booth, Philip Adrian Booth
Actors: Keith Age, Christopher Saint Booth, Philip Adrian Booth, William Bradshaw
